column1: Coronavirus and the Sun: A Lesson from the 1918 Influenza Pandemic: Records from the 1918 pandemic suggest one technique for dealing with influenza — little-known today — was effective. Some hard-won experience from the greatest pandemic in recorded http://tinyurl.com/ybx45bmb
